data.name: The University of Sheffield
content: Currently enrolled in advanced studies focusing on Machine Learning, Cybersecurity, and Data Science, with opportunities for research, hands-on projects, and industry collaborations.

data.name: Sri Krishna College of Engineering and Technology
content: Studied foundational subjects including Data Structures, Algorithms, DBMS, Operating Systems, Computer Architecture, and Artificial Intelligence.
Participated and won numerous prizes in various national and international hackathons.
Attended seminars and workshops by seniors, startups, and industry professionals, facilitating valuable networking opportunities.
